args: Yep. There's a new place in a nearby town\nthat's a bit short-staffed in the kitchen.
Want to give it a shot?
You bet! I mean, I've never actually cooked\nbefore, but I'll do my best.
Perhaps I will accompany you, then;\nyou are in need of a guide if nothing else.
I'm more of an eater than a cooker,\nso I'd be useless in a kitchen.
Yeah, probably for the best. Let's go.
Hello, my name is Sophie. Please tell me\nhow I can help around your restaurant.
You're just in the nick of time!\nYou can start with adding spice to those\npots there.
The spice bottle's right next to them.\nThree shakes should do it.
Hmm... This spice looks a bit like the\n＂pepper＂ I've seen Joker use.
Right then, three shakes!\nOne... Two... Thr... Thre...
What's this feeling? It's tickling my nose!\nWow, having a real body really is some...\nsomethi...
Hey, what are you DOING?!\nSneezing in the kitchen is a health hazard!
A-CHOO! Sorry! I'm really sorry!\nThe spice is just—A-CHOO!\nIt's very—A-CHOO!
That's one sensitive sniffer you've got.\nSorry for putting you on spice duty.
Good news is, you only snotted up a few\npots. Anyway, let's find you a different job.
Go prep those ingredients, would you?\nNothing sneeze-worthy over there.\nJust cut and chop and prep. BAM!
Well, I may have messed up the first time,\nbut this is my chance for redemption!
Hold on, what are these? Walnuts?\nJoker had a special tool he used to\ncrack the shells, right? Maybe it's this?
Okay, just put the nut here and squeeze...
No, Sophie! Stop! If you crack nebblenuts\nlike that, you destroy all the meat inside!
They are not. Do you not have\nnebblenuts in your world?
No, it would seem not—which means you\nare likely not familiar with...most of this.
How about this: I will deal with nuts and\nvegetables, while you prepare the meat.
Good idea. I assume chopping meat is\nmuch the same from one world to another.
Sadly, I've never used a knife before—\nbut I've seen Joker use one many times!
He curves his fingers like this...\nAnd then makes the blade go... OW!
Did you cut your finger, Sophie?
I tried to do it just like you...
Yeah, the real thing is pretty different.\nStill, you shouldn't be cutting meat with\na finger injury like that.
I'll take over. You watch and learn.
Oh man, you look lower than a snake in\na wheel rut. Things not go well down at\nthe ol' hash-slingery?
I couldn't do anything. I was useless.
Cleo and Joker ended up having to\nperform all of my tasks for me.
My whole purpose as an AI is to\nhelp people, but in the end...

Don't be so hard on yourself, Sophie.
It is always difficult to prepare for real-
world situations—especially when you
have never BEEN real before!
All things considered, I think you did\nremarkably well.
Yeah, so turn that frown around, chum!\nPobody's nerfect, so you just go out there\nand get 'em next time.
Even the restaurant owner could tell\nhow hard you were working.
It's not like you ruined anything, so just\ntake what you learned for next time.
You're all as kind as Joker and the others.\nThank you very much.
And you're right: I can't get too down about\nthis. I need to do better next time!

I've analyzed the reasons for my recent
shortcomings, and I think I needed
more study and practice in advance.
I won't make that mistake ever again!
Oh yeah, you always gotta come screamin'\ninto a thing with a plan. But say, is there\nanything I can do to help?
I would also be willing to help; I'm curious\nto learn more about the differences\nbetween our worlds anyway.
If I want to be humanity's companion,\nI have to do this right next time!
